title: Nisha

properties.name: description
properties.value: Nisha is a woman panning for gold and artefacts in the River Salve, as part of the Digsite in eastern Misthalin. She cannot be spoken to or interacted with in any way.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Nisha
Nisha
Released22 August 2006 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman
LocationEastern Digsite
GenderFemale
ExamineA woman busily panning.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3642

Nisha is a woman panning for gold and artefacts in the River Salve, as part of the Digsite in eastern Misthalin. She cannot be spoken to or interacted with in any way.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Nisha is a common name in India.
